channel.title: Sega Channel History on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Sega Channel History on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Sega, In Channel Form
item.description: [big]If you’re a fan of Nintendo today, odds are you’ve been getting a bit of an earful about the company’s botched voice chat, which is a key element of the company’s online service for the Switch.[/big] But video game companies failing to properly roll out online features is a problem that’s anything but new—in fact, it’s been happening for decades, a mixture of failing to understand the audience and failing to properly use the technology in the right context.
